text: In what year will the 17- year and 13- year cicadas next appear together? Explain.

The two cicadas will appear next after 221 years, in the year 2242.

This is the product of 13 and 17. Because 13 and 17 do not share factors, their LCM is equal to their product. Not all students will understand this after Problem 2.1. Many will begin listing multiples of 13 and multiples of 17 to see when their first common multiple occurs. This makes sense and shouldn't be disallowed
